branchCategory.name: IZT40/41/42, Bar Type Ionizer, Separate Controller and Power Supply Module
branchCategory.description: <p>The IZT bar ionizer is an industrial static control solution.  Bar ionizers generate a curtain of static eliminating ions effective for a distance up to 2000mm/6.5 ft.  The IZT's low profile is also ideal for tight clearance installations.  Compared to SMC's IZS4 bar ionizers, the power supply and control modules have been separated from the bar, resulting in a reduction in bar height.  IZT bars can be placed closer to static-carriying materials in more confined adjacent spaces.  The separate controller can be mounted in a workstation for easier access and observation during operation.  Models include the standard IZT40, the IZT41 which adds auto-balance, emitter maintenance detection, and I/O signals, and the IZT42 with low amplitude ion generation for sensitive electronics.  Extending the value of IZT, one controller can manage a maximum of 4 ionizing bars.  Needle cartridges are easily removed, without tools, for cleaning or end-of-life replacement, futher extending this ionizer's value.</p>

breadCrumb.name: IZT40/41/42, Bar Type Ionizer, Separate Controller and Power Supply Module
